headers.subject: Re: Updated RDF Grammar

quote.quotepara: Although, I can't see what use an empty <rdf:RDF/> would be, it is still OK.
I hope this answers your questions

body.para: Thank you, and yes, this answers my questions. An empty <rdf:RDF/> expresses an empty model. It may be useful in set-operations involving multiple (partial) models, for example merging and difference.
